content:
I don't have personal opinions or emotions, but i can provide insights based on the available data. 

the rise of tiktok has had a profound impact on the music industry and the way that artists promote their music. tiktok offers a platform for musicians to showcase their work to a vast audience and gain exposure to fans who may not have discovered them otherwise. tiktok's algorithm also prioritizes sound-based content, which has led to the creation of viral dance challenges and song mashups. as a result, many artists are now releasing music with the specific goal of going viral on tiktok, and promoting their music on the app itself.

additionally, tiktok has become a crucial tool for music discovery, with many users discovering new songs through viral videos and trends on the app. this has given rise to a new type of influencer, the tiktok creator, who can introduce their followers to new artists and boost their popularity.

overall, tiktok has given artists a unique opportunity to connect with fans and promote their music in a creative and engaging way, and we are likely to continue seeing its impact on the music industry in the coming years.
